TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kawbu’, title = Kawbu’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kawbu’} }

S.FORM: Kawbu' Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Kawbu' a niyaro', 31 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 110 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 85% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 93 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 15% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 76%, Amis 6%, roma 2%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'

Kawbo' Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Kawbo' a niyaro', 31 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 110 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 85% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 93 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 15% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 17 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 76%, Amis 6%, roma 2%. O katadamaanan no niyaro'
